p: Sequences were aligned using ClustalO [ 13] with subsequent manual correction by BioEdit (version 7.1.3.0). For phylogenetic analyses, UTR sequences were removed. Maximum likelihood (ML) phylogenetic trees were constructed using online web server (CIPRES) [ 14], as implemented in RAxML [ 15] program (version 8.2.10), under the General Time Reversible (GTR) model of nucleotide substitution with 1,000 bootstrap replicates. The final ML trees were visualized using Figtree (version 1.4.3).
